title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PCs are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: The current behavior does not have a UI option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
EB: The expected behavior is to have a UI option in the preferences menu that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch Eclipse on a Windows workstation used as an X terminal.
2. Open the preferences menu.
3. Navigate to the section related to line delimiters for new files.
4. Verify that there is no UI option to define the default line delimiters.
5. Expected: There should be a UI option to define the default line delimiters for new files.
